# TigreGÃ³tico

> Premium Consulting Services for FOSS Voice Technology and AI. We specialize in privacy-first voice assistants, custom web development, and are the core maintainers of the OpenVoiceOS stack.

## Core Information
- [Home](https://tigregotico.github.io/): Main landing page with an overview of services, featured projects, and latest updates.
- [About](https://tigregotico.github.io/about): Information about the team, our mission in open-source voice tech, and our role in the OpenVoiceOS ecosystem.
- [Services](https://tigregotico.github.io/services): Detailed consulting offerings including FOSS Voice Tech & AI strategies, custom TTS models, OpenVoiceOS plugins, and privacy-focused web development.
- [Contact](https://tigregotico.github.io/contact): Contact information for inquiries, consulting requests, and collaboration.

## Projects & Resources
- [Projects](https://tigregotico.github.io/projects): Showcase of our open-source contributions and partnerships.
- [Blog](https://tigregotico.github.io/blog): Articles, tutorials, and insights on voice AI, OpenVoiceOS development, and synthetic data generation.
- [Resources](https://tigregotico.github.io/resources): Tools, datasets, documentation, and community resources for developers and integrators.

## External Links
- [GitHub Profile](https://github.com/TigreGotico): Our open-source repositories.
- [Hugging Face](https://huggingface.co/TigreGotico): Our collection of AI models and datasets.
- [OpenVoiceOS](https://openvoiceos.org): The official platform for the Open Voice OS, which we actively maintain and support.
